title: updating the electron version to 33.2.1
body:
From the [electron release notes](https://releases.electronjs.org/releases/stable)

https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/44277 - upload file bug might fix https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1469 
https://github.com/electron/electron/pull/44800 and https://github.com/electron/electron/pull/44753 - drag issue, might fix the https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1487 (more a hope than anything)
https://github.com/electron/electron/pull/44671 - WebContentsView issue that might fix https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1490
